Text: Can not get it to install on 64 bit Windows 7 Ultimate. It won't go past the Visual Basic C++ 2008 installer. It gives an error.

I have windows 7 ultimate x64 and windows 8 professional x64 and it works perfectly on both and all the other systems I install too! try restarting and running the installation again! if not try removing visual basic c++ 2008 and reinstalling, hope this works for you :)
